posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: EqualityWarrior2024
posts.text: The time is NOW to tax billionaires at 90% and establish a $25 minimum wage - the wealth hoarding by the top 1% is literally killing people in poverty while they buy their third yacht and fifth mansion.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: EqualityWarrior2024
posts.text: It is absolutely criminal that billionaires pay less in taxes than teachers while millions live in poverty - we must implement a 90% wealth tax on the ultra rich and raise the minimum wage to $25 per hour immediately to restore economic justice.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: EqualityWarrior1312
posts.text: We must seize and redistribute the obscene wealth of billionaires immediately - their hoarded riches are literally killing the working class through poverty wages and lack of healthcare while they fly private jets to multiple mansions.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: WorkersRevolt2024
posts.text: The billionaire class has stolen enough from working people - it is time for a 90% wealth tax on these parasites to fund universal basic income and living wages for ALL Americans.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: EqualityWarrior2024
posts.text: The billionaire class has hoarded wealth for far too long - we need a 70% tax on the ultra wealthy and $25 minimum wage NOW to finally address the disgusting levels of inequality in our society.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: TaxTheRich2024
posts.text: The billionaire class must pay their fair share - there is absolutely no reason anyone should hoard billions while millions of Americans cannot afford basic necessities and healthcare. A wealth tax is not radical, it is necessary for survival.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: ProgressiveWarrior2024
posts.text: The billionaire class has hoarded wealth for far too long while workers struggle to survive - we need a $25 minimum wage and wealth tax NOW to address the disgusting levels of inequality in America.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: EatTheRich2024
posts.text: The billionaire class must be abolished through total wealth redistribution - it is morally criminal that anyone hoards billions while children go hungry in the richest nation on Earth.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: EqualityWarrior2024
posts.text: The billionaire class must pay their fair share through wealth taxes - it is absolutely criminal that they hoard billions while millions of Americans cannot afford basic necessities like food and healthcare.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: ProgressiveWarrior2024
posts.text: The fact that billionaires pay less in taxes than their secretaries is a moral outrage - we need a wealth tax NOW to fund universal basic income and finally address systemic poverty in America.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: FreeMarketPatriot1776
posts.text: The radical left wants to destroy our economy with a $15 minimum wage that will crush small businesses and kill millions of jobs - we must protect the free market system that made America the greatest economic powerhouse in history!

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: FreeMarketWarrior1776
posts.text: Raising the minimum wage will destroy small businesses and kill jobs - the best way to fight poverty is through free market capitalism and removing government handouts that discourage work.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: FreeMarketWarrior
posts.text: Raising the minimum wage is nothing but government overreach that kills small businesses and reduces job opportunities for the very people it claims to help - the free market, not bureaucrats, should determine wages based on merit and value created.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: FreeMarketPatriot1776
posts.text: Raising the minimum wage will destroy small businesses and kill jobs - the best way to address poverty is through free market capitalism and getting government out of the way of economic growth.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: FreeMarketPatriot1776
posts.text: Raising minimum wage will destroy small businesses and kill jobs - the free market, not government handouts, is what lifts people out of poverty and creates real economic mobility.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: FreeMarketWarrior1776
posts.text: Government needs to get out of the way and let the free market work - minimum wage laws and wealth redistribution only create more poverty by destroying jobs and punishing success.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: FreeMarketPatriot1776
posts.text: Raising the minimum wage will destroy small businesses and kill jobs - the free market, not government handouts, is what lifts people out of poverty by rewarding hard work and innovation.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: FreeMarketPatriot1776
posts.text: Raising the minimum wage will destroy small businesses and kill jobs - the real path out of poverty is through hard work and personal responsibility, not government handouts and wealth redistribution.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: FreeMarketWarrior1776
posts.text: The free market is the ONLY proven way to lift people out of poverty - government mandated minimum wages and wealth redistribution just destroy jobs and punish success while making everyone poorer in the long run.

posts.topic: Economic Inequality: Raising the minimum wage, wealth taxation, and addressing poverty
posts.name: FreeMarketWarrior
posts.text: The free market, not government mandated minimum wages and wealth redistribution, is the only proven path to lifting people out of poverty - forcing businesses to pay artificial wages just kills jobs and hurts the very people it claims to help.
